h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: After taking them out, look for an opening in the cave wall where a large column is, and at its base will be a small chest near a Blazebone firing projectiles at you. Loot the chest after defeating it to gain a new Curio - the **Glazed Reliquary**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
After taking them out, look for an opening in the cave wall where a large column is, and at its base will be a small chest near a Blazebone firing projectiles at you. Loot the chest after defeating it to gain a new Curio - the **Glazed Reliquary**.
